Class Node

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.node.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
INode
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitcoinNode
public abstract class Node extends Object implements INode
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Enterprise Systems Group @ York University

    • startMining

      public void startMining(double interval)
      Starts mining with the specified expected mining interval. The interval may be based on when the next validation event takes place.
      Parameters:
      interval - The mining interval (in seconds).

    • startMining

      public void startMining()
      Starts mining without specifying an expected mining interval.

    • isMining

      public boolean isMining()
      Checks if the node is currently mining.
      Returns:
      true if the node is mining, false otherwise.

      public void propagateContainer(ITxContainer txc, long time)
      Propagates the specified transaction container to other nodes in the simulation. TODO: All time references should be on a global time parameter.
      Parameters:
      txc - The transaction container to be propagated.
      time - The current simulation time.

    • getNextValidationEvent

      public Event getNextValidationEvent()
      Returns the next validation event associated with this node. Useful for removing the event when necessary.
      Returns:
      The next validation Event.

    • resetNextValidationEvent

      public void resetNextValidationEvent()
      Deletes the next validation event associated with this node. TODO: how does this affect cycle counting statistics?

    • scheduleValidationEvent

      public long scheduleValidationEvent(ITxContainer txc, long time)
      Schedules a validation event for the specified transaction container at the given time.
      Parameters:
      txc - The transaction container to be validated.
      time - The simulation time when the scheduling occurs. The even will be scheduled at `time + mining interval`.
      Returns:
      The scheduled mining interval in seconds.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
